oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sweet Thurday: Special Vietnam Moratorium Edition (student-produced newsletter)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Peace; Underground newspapers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
"Sweet Thursday," the underground student newspaper at Christian Brothers College, always supported the Peace Movement, and never more so than with this special edition promoting and advertising the Vietnam Moratorium events on October 15, 1968.
Alongside a program for the event, peace-oriented poetry, and other material was a suggestion that mixed-gender dormitories might be reasonable--and a denunciation of the petty theft that apparently plagued the campus.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Michael J. Dean, Mike L. "Marty" Rice, Wayne Carrozza, James Coleman - staff members
